In the end you didn't know whether to get angry or cry for all this mess you got in. In the end you walk away from them.

When you finally reach the address you see an apartment building standing. You already had a feeling that was the case when you got the address. Luckily Paul's family lived on the first floor, so instead of using the elevator you run up the stairs. You couldn't have better done that, as Paul's body is out of air. That boy must train some more. You finally reach the door of the apartment where Paul lives. Your first reaction is to ring the doorbell, but before doing it you realize that you are Paul. You live here. Nobody would ring the doorbell of the place he or she lives. So you quickly check if the door is locked and to your surprise it's not. You open the door and step inside.

What kind of family does Paul have?
